Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of chest and one foreleg remaining) to left; part of two rising triangles and rosette as filling ornament; below, single dilute line.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0446) (phase 2)
